import Layout from "../layout/Layout"; import { useRef, useState } from "react"; import classes from "../Home/Home.module.css"; import styles from "../CommonInput/Input.module.css"; import Card from "../UI/Card/Card"; import Button from "../UI/Button/Button"; import useHttp from "../../hooks/use-http"; import Input from "../CommonInput/Input"; function Home() { const [routes, setRoutes] = useState([]); const [formIsValid, setFormIsValid] = useState(false); const { isLoading, error, sendRequest: sendTaskRequest, response, resetError, resetResponse, } = useHttp(); const planetInputRef = useRef(); //Request to backend for login and sign-up const SearchRoutesHandler = async (requestJson) => { sendTaskRequest({ url: "http://localhost:8080/loginAuth", method: "post", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: { from: requestJson.enteredName, to: requestJson.enteredEmail, class: requestJson.enteredClass, journeyDate: requestJson.journeyDate, }, errorMsg: "Request failed!", }); }; return (
    Hi
); } export default Home;
